text:
(ENCHANTER) You weave your spell with a few quick gestures and a muttered incantation.

[A voice that only you can hear comes from a barrel nearby. It is the high, piping voice of a faltyn, an ethereal spirit summoned by your spell. "Well, I'll tell you which pennant to go for," snickers the faltyn. "but you'll have to give me all your gold. Is that a deal?"]

choices.text: Pay all your gold to the faltyn
You won't part with your gold
